name: Weekly Game Jam 162
description:
Entry for the Weekly Game Jam 162 - Crabs

You are a marine photographer and need to take pictures of crabs.

Your company has equipped you with and underwater drone with a camera underneath. 

Dodge the plastic bags and take photos of the crabs. If you hit too many bags the rotors will get jammed and you will have to send it away to get fixed.

---

My first game jam game submitted on time! The font size and placement is off but I handed it in on time! :D

Music  and sounds from zapslat.com
